feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 6 stages: D, R, I, V, E, R2.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The student shows a functioning financial application with concrete, demonstrable features (transaction logging, bill management, spending analysis, and what‑if tools) and live data updates, satisfying the criterion. Implementation and reflect evidence confirm the app is operational and purposefully designed for financial tasks.
- Integrate AI: The submission shows a functioning AI component that uses real user data to provide contextual financial feedback (implementation evidence) and the student reflects on making the AI non-generic and improving it (reflection evidence). This demonstrates effective AI integration that adds value to the tool, meeting PASS criteria.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "I'm a smart money dashboard built for college students who are juggling work, rent, subscriptions and school costs."
"This app is fully functional end to end. I can add, edit bills, log transactions, see charts, update, talk to the AI coach in one continuous flow."
"As soon as I hit add, you can see the total spent and safe to spend changes as well."
criteria.driver_alignment:
Discover: defined a clear user need (college students managing income, rent, subscriptions).  
Implement: demonstrated working features (editable income, add/edit bills, transactions, charts, AI coach, what‑if lab) and live updates.  
Reflect: noted synchronization and future improvements, showing understanding of app reliability and data integrity.
criteria.reasoning: The student shows a functioning financial application with concrete, demonstrable features (transaction logging, bill management, spending analysis, and what‑if tools) and live data updates, satisfying the criterion. Implementation and reflect evidence confirm the app is operational and purposefully designed for financial tasks.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "So on the right here is also an AI financial coach. So I can go in and say how am I? ... you're doing great this month with a monthly income of 1800, only spending 155 so far. You're well below your budget, allowing you to comfortably meet your savings goal of 200."
"This app is fully functional end to end. I can add, edit bills, log transactions, see charts, update, talk to the AI coach in one continuous flow."
"Wearing the AI so it reacts to the real data instead of just answering generically was important too."
criteria.driver_alignment:
- Implement: Demonstrates an integrated, working AI coach within the app flow that consumes app data and provides contextual responses.
- Reflect: Student acknowledges making the AI data-reactive and expresses intent to strengthen the AI, showing metacognitive evaluation of the integration.
criteria.reasoning: The submission shows a functioning AI component that uses real user data to provide contextual financial feedback (implementation evidence) and the student reflects on making the AI non-generic and improving it (reflection evidence). This demonstrates effective AI integration that adds value to the tool, meeting PASS criteria.
